---
title: "Figure 12"
output: pdf_document
---


```{r, echo=T}
result <- factor(data$is_fake_news, levels = c("TRUE", "FALSE"))

ggplot(data, aes(x=num_urls, group=result, fill=result)) + geom_histogram(aes(y=..density..), position="dodge") + scale_y_continuous(labels=function(x) paste0(x/10)) + labs(y="Density", fill="Is_Fake_news") + ggtitle("Distribution of Number of URLs Per Tweet")
```
